listAsq.title: Where Can I Sell Used Items?
listAsq.content:
Selling used items can be time-consuming and frustrating. You might consider platforms like Facebook Marketplace, eBay, or Offer Up, but these require negotiating with strangers, waiting for responses, and arranging meetups—which isn’t always safe or efficient.
Another option is selling to a pawn shop near you, but traditional pawn shops often offer much less than expected.
At Buddy Cash Pawn Shop in Miami, we offer a smarter solution. You can sell your used items today at a competitive price without leaving your home. Our process is fully online—just send us a photo, and we’ll provide an offer. You decide whether to accept—no obligations, no wasted time.
We know that pawn shops in Miami don’t always have the best reputation, which is why we focus on transparency and convenience. With Buddy Cash, you get the speed of a pawn shop and a fair price—without the hassle of online marketplaces.

listAsq.title: Who Purchases Pre-Owned Goods?
listAsq.content:
In Miami, there aren’t many companies willing to come and buy all your items at once. Most services that do offer pick-up are simply junk removal companies—they clear out your space for free but don’t pay you anything.
Of course, you could sell your items individually through online marketplaces. But ask yourself—how much time will that take, and is it really worth the hassle?
At Pawn Shop Buddy Cash, we make selling easy. We buy everything—from gold to diamonds, bicycles to yachts, phones to refrigerators, RVs to luxury villas. Our at-home appraisal service is completely free, so you don’t even have to leave your house.

listAsq.title: Do You Offer Item Pickup Services?
listAsq.content: Yes, Pawn Shop Buddy Cash provides professional item pickup services across Florida. Regardless of your location, our team can come to you the same day to assess and purchase your item on the spot.

listAsq.title: How Is an Offline Appraisal Conducted?
listAsq.content:
The offline appraisal process begins when you contact us through your preferred communication method (iMessage, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, or email) and send photos of your items along with model information. Within 10–15 minutes, you will receive an estimated value. If you find the price acceptable, an appraisal specialist can visit your home the same day for an in-person evaluation. Upon completing a detailed inspection, you will receive payment immediately.
It is essential to disclose any defects or damage upfront to ensure the physical inspection price matches the initial estimate. We have observed that this type of appraisal service is not commonly offered by pawnshops in Miami, making our service unique in the market.

listAsq.title: What Is Buddy Cash Pawn Shop?
listAsq.content:
Online Appraisals: We've eliminated the need to search for and travel to pawn shops. Save your time by getting an estimate within minutes online. There's no pressure or manipulation about your item's value, allowing you to make decisions with a clear mind.
Fair Market Value: We understand that most people visit pawn shops due to financial needs. While local pawn shops may take advantage of this by offering minimal prices, we provide fair market value appraisals backed by data and research.
Convenience Service: If you accept our online estimate, we will come to your location the same day with payment in hand.

listAsq.title: When Will I Receive Payment?
listAsq.content:
At Pawn Shop Buddy Cash, payment is issued immediately after our specialist verifies the item's functionality and condition during the in-person inspection. We offer multiple payment options, including cash, bank transfer, Zelle, Cash App, Venmo, and PayPal.
If you choose to ship your items in Buddy Cash , payment will be released on the same day we receive your package. We cover all shipping and insurance costs to ensure a smooth and secure transaction.
